sentences.en: An incisive change in Greek philosophy and thought took place in the fifth century.
sentences.cn: 公元五世纪、希腊的哲学和思想发生了一次深刻的变化.

sentences.en: Any trawl through the band's interviews will reveal statements that are challenging and incisive.
sentences.cn: 随便选取一段对该乐队的访谈都能发现令人深思、犀利精辟的言论.

sentences.en: Each area comprises industry - focussed teams dedicated to delivering incisive advice.
sentences.cn: 每个领域都有专业的团队,来提供精深的咨询服务.

sentences.en: He combined curious qualities of naivete with incisive wit and worldly sophistication.
sentences.cn: 他把天真质朴的奇怪品质同锐利的机智和老练的世故结合了起来.

sentences.en: He combined curious qualities of naivety with incisive wit and worldly sophistication.
sentences.cn: 他集天真质朴的好奇、锐利的机智和老练的世故于一体.

sentences.en: He had an incisive , quickmotioned , self - sufficient manner.
sentences.cn: 他具有机敏,轻捷, 矜持的态度.

sentences.en: He had too incisive and agile a mind.
sentences.cn: 他的思路过于犀利敏捷.

sentences.en: He is a very shrewd operator with an incisive mind.
sentences.cn: 他是一位非常精明的经营者，有着敏锐的头脑。

sentences.en: His poetry is garrulous , intellectually incisive and adjectivally rich.
sentences.cn: 麦克尼斯的诗歌冗长絮叨,思想深邃,并且富含形容词.

sentences.en: His presentation was clear and incisive.
Incisive Run - Dribbles from the side to cut Into the box ( like Messi )
sentences.cn: 灵敏突破 - 由边路带球切入禁区 ( 就像梅西 )

sentences.en: Lee was at the hub of some incisive attacks in the second half.
sentences.cn: 在下半场，李组织了几次快速进攻。

sentences.en: She picked up the gauntlet in her incisive Keynote Address to the Conference.
sentences.cn: 在大会主题发言中，她言辞犀利地回应挑战。

sentences.en: The incisive , cultured but unaffected voice matched Peat - Smith's ingenuous appearance.
sentences.cn: 皮特 -史密斯 开门见山,彬彬有礼, 而又不失于矫揉造作的话语同他那幅真诚的表情很相称.

sentences.en: There was good wits, incisive but always peripheral information.
sentences.cn: 宴会上有时妙语连珠,谈吐锋利而所论却总不免是些毛皮小事.

words.tran_cn: 雕刻的；切入的；有锯齿状边缘的

trans.tran_cn: 直接的，尖锐的，深刻的，单刀直入的
trans.tran_en: showing intelligence and a clear understanding of something
